add.success: Your payment method has been successfully added.
add.error: There was an issue adding your payment method, please try again and if you continue to have issues contact support.

edit.paymentUpdated: Your payment method has been updated.
edit.success: Your payment method has been successfully updated.
edit.error: There was an issue updating your payment method, please try again and if you continue to have issues contact support.

setAsDefault.title: Set as Default Payment Method
setAsDefault.success: Your preferred payment method has been updated.
setAsDefault.error: There was an issue updating your preferred payment method, please try again and if you continue to have issues contact support.

remove.drawerHeading: Are you sure you want to delete this payment method?
remove.warningMessage: By deleting this payment method, it will be removed from your account.

remove.error: There was an issue removing your payment method, please try again and if you continue to have issues contact support.
